oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Multi-year drought alters plant species composition more than productivity across northern temperate grasslands

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is the replication data associated with our article in "Journal of Ecology" titled "Multi-year drought alters plant species composition more than productivity across northern temperate grasslands". Please see the ReadMe file for details on dataset contents.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Climate extremes, drought, grasslands, plant species composition, productivity, precipitation manipulation
